dealer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who buys and sells a particular product, especially an expensive one
dealer.translation[0].definitions[2].def: someone who gives out playing cards in a game
dealer.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who buys and sells a particular type of goods
dealer.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Collectors were looking for guidance from experienced art dealers.
dealer.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a shop that sells a particular type of goods
dealer.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Computers should always be bought from a reputable dealer.
dealer.translation[1].definitions[2].def: someone whose job is buying and selling bonds, shares, currencies, etc on a financial market
dealer.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: On the London Futures & Options Exchange, dealers rushed to obtain cocoa.
